text: Henry Harold Alessio (22 December 1895 – 16 February 1973) was an Australian rules footballer. ==Playing career== Alessio, a North Melbourne junior, played 38 games for Richmond in the Victorian Football League between 1915 and 1919. ==References== ==External links== Category:Richmond Football Club players Category:Australian rules footballers from Victoria (Australia) Category:1895 births Category:1973 deaths
title: Harry Alessio
